previewArticle.title: Chicago Fire vs. Vancouver Whitecaps | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chicago Fire 0, Vancouver Whitecaps 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Both the Chicago Fire and Vancouver Whitecaps look for their first wins of the season as the teams square off at Toyota Park.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chicago Fire vs. Vancouver Whitecaps | March 14th, 2015

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Fire Conf Live
timelineItems.text: Anthem's sung, coin flipped. Whitecaps to kick off, #cf97 to defend The Harlem End. Jon Busch gives a nice recognition to @Section8Chicago.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: First up: #CHIvVAN. Let's get to it. Follow here: http://t.co/f2EJxyKxy3 #cf97 #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Polster (Chicago Fire).
Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: GlassCity
timelineItems.text: I count two strikes against Beitashour already. #whitecapsfc #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: 10' - Nice play from Morales and Manneh ruined by poor shot by the former. CHI 0-0 VAN #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Average distance of a Fire pass right now: 600 miles. http://t.co/xH94sIbeEV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Kekuta Manneh following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Joevin Jones (Chicago Fire) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Shaun Maloney.

timelineItems.name: VCTF
timelineItems.text: Lovely counter attack until that fateful last touch by Pedro. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: BCSoccerweb.com
timelineItems.text: Ousted's aggressiveness has improved leaps and bounds over his early starts for #VWFC. His 50th consecutive start is well earned!

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Pedro Morales, you are a million times better than that. Regardless, Fire defense is a disaster in transition. GoalS coming. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps FC. Pedro Morales tries a through ball, but Sam Adekugbe is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jeff Thorlacius
timelineItems.text: Can't believe we got away with that in the box! #VWFC #VANvsCHI

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 12 MIN The 'Caps survive a penalty scare in their own box. It's been end-to-end in the early exchanges. #VWFC #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Aleksa Stefanov
timelineItems.text: My Fiery stache #CHIvVAN #cf97 http://t.co/QlTzliKrbJ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Raúl Octavio Rivero with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: 14' - Rivero sets up Laba, but the shot is wide of target. CHI 0-0 VAN #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Nelson Santos
timelineItems.text: Laba with the shot attempt. He's reached the season quota. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: If you've got a 5-foot-8 center forward & two small, skillful center mids, there's really no choice but to play route 1. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: If the Whitecaps get 5% of their attempts on frame, they will score 45 goals. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: AFTN
timelineItems.text: Vancouver are ripping Chicago apart up the left. Manneh and Adekugbe must surely do some real damage any moment now. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Joevin Jones.

timelineItems.name: Fire Conf Live
timelineItems.text: Stephens playing on the right, but he almost appears to be playing more of a #8 role. Spending a lot of time pinched in centrally. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #cf97 🎺 http://t.co/eehaTG9sFC

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Fedora
timelineItems.text: Fire much more willing to press today. Not surprising considering they're at home and not playing the defending champions. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kekuta Manneh.
Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Foul by Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire).
Mauro Rosales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Fire Conf Live
timelineItems.text: 18'- Tiebert with a hard foul on Maloney. Then Rosales is fouled. Pretty fouly thusfar. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Megs. #vwfc #CHIvVAN http://t.co/vkyBdDkr5f

timelineItems.comment: Joevin Jones (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).

timelineItems.name: Kevin Mayweather
timelineItems.text: Its been too long! #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left misses to the right. Assisted by Mauro Rosales with a cross.

timelineItems.name: John
timelineItems.text: Is #CF97 playing the revolutionary 4-0-1?

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Chicago Fire 0, Vancouver Whitecaps FC 1.

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Encouraging from Adekugbe today. Rivero very good, minus some finishing. Ousted's two first-half saves were big. 1-0 final. #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.desc: The Vancouver Whitecaps spoil the Chicago Fire's home opener with their own first win of the 2015 season.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chicago Fire vs. Vancouver Whitecaps | March 14, 2015

timelineItems.name: ExtraTime Radio
timelineItems.text: #vwfc just waste too many scoring opportunities #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Brian Sandalow
timelineItems.text: Fire still bombing in too many crosses for my taste, especially considering that their advanced players aren't exactly tall. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Sabrina Franco
timelineItems.text: Poor Manneh, he's playing really really well and his team mates are slow to react :( #VWFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Joevin Jones (Chicago Fire) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 24 MIN HUUUUGGGEE save for Ousted who keeps this level. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Chicago Fire
timelineItems.text: That Maloney rip had eyes for the far post. 👀 #cf97 #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Shocking corner from Shaun Maloney... What was that?!! #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is blocked.
Corner,  Chicago Fire. Conceded by Russell Teibert.

timelineItems.name: Residualimage
timelineItems.text: I love Rivero's war face #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Eric Gehrig (Chicago Fire) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Shaun Maloney with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.desc: Matt Polster (Chicago Fire) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Matt Polster is booked for persistent infringement

timelineItems.name: Marco Delgado
timelineItems.text: Harsh foul on Rosales #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Matt Polster (Chicago Fire).
Mauro Rosales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Matt Polster (Chicago Fire).

timelineItems.name: Andrew Shnay
timelineItems.text: So our new defenders still get beat 1v1 off the dribble by any player who can, like, dribble with both feet. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Martin Medina
timelineItems.text: What a display by Amerikwa on that turn and surge forward! #cf97

timelineItems.name: Todd
timelineItems.text: @QuincyAmarikwa looking very dangerous this game. Running through many #vwfc players

timelineItems.name: Chris May
timelineItems.text: On the positive side, Jovin Jones looks really solid. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mauro Rosales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Lovel Palmer (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Harrison Shipp (Chicago Fire) left footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: David Ousted blocks Harry Shipp’s rocket

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: 32' - Gehrig's been good so far, but has had his problems with Manneh and Rivero so far. CHI 0-0 VAN #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Fire Conf Live
timelineItems.text: Stephens has a lot of talent. He's better than Cocis IMO. Gehrig at RB experiment needs to end like...now. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Harrison Shipp (Chicago Fire) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Quincy Amarikwa.
Corner,  Chicago Fire. Conceded by Steven Beitashour.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Dixon
timelineItems.text: Ousted coming up big for the #Whitecaps for the third time to keep it scoreless #CHIvsVAN #MLS #cf97

timelineItems.name: My Special Mess
timelineItems.text: #chicagofire #pubtopitch #chicago #soccer #mls #cf97 http://t.co/vYyDMfDPLX

timelineItems.comment: Joevin Jones (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).

timelineItems.name: Jason Button
timelineItems.text: I like Eric Gehrig as a defender, but he clearly isn't a wing back! #cf97

timelineItems.name: Jeff Crandall
timelineItems.text: View from the skyway is awesome #cf97 http://t.co/oADmVGODzX

timelineItems.name: Louis East
timelineItems.text: Great build up play by the Fire and Shipp ends up firing his shot straight at David Ousted. #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Joevin Jones (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Jarred
timelineItems.text: 34' in and I'm already sick of Manneh's performance. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Fedora
timelineItems.text: Joevin Jones is having himself a game today. Nice sequence to stop Manneh on the break and start the transition. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Beitashour is not closing the wide man down well enough. A concern... #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Harrison Shipp (Chicago Fire) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Michael Stephens.
Corner,  Chicago Fire. Conceded by David Ousted.

timelineItems.name: Chicago Fire
timelineItems.text: Michael Stephens. Cheeky. #cf97

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Jon Busch makes the stop on Kekuta Manneh

timelineItems.name: Brian Sandalow
timelineItems.text: Busch with a stop on Manneh after getting past a slipping Gehrig. Manneh a handful today. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Mack Williams
timelineItems.text: Ousted is the only reason why Vancouver isn't down 3-0. Chicago is bringing the Fire. See what I did there?? #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Raúl Octavio Rivero.

timelineItems.name: Sabrina Franco
timelineItems.text: Mauro Rosales always gets beat up #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Brian Sandalow
timelineItems.text: Loud start for Polster - yellow carded in the fourth. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Ben Baer
timelineItems.text: Chicago need to get Gehrig out of this game at halftime. Getting worked by Manneh and Rivero. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Adailton (Chicago Fire).
Mauro Rosales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Ian
timelineItems.text: This game's improved dramatically over the last 10 minutes or so. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Quincy Amarikwa deserves a goal, btw. Dude's a warrior. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Fire Conf Live
timelineItems.text: Rosales acting decapitated for the 7th time this half. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Joe Hoffmann
timelineItems.text: Actively ruining my child's life #mls #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Mauro Rosales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Rosales still receiving treatment. Replays show his ankle might have got turned during the challenge. #VWFC #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: 43' - Looks like Rosales is hurt for real. Player swarming up for the Caps' on the sideline. CHI 0-0 VAN #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Danny Michallik
timelineItems.text: Barring customary nerves that come w/ your first start, Polster showing everyone how to play with an early yellow card to your name. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Colin Waters
timelineItems.text: Yallop is the poorest dressed football manager I've ever seen. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Guillermo Rivera
timelineItems.text: Vancouver appears content to sit back and counter. Have looked dangerous from there but #cf97 better overall so far.

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: 45+1' - Looks like Rosales is unable to continue. A sub getting ready for #VWFC. CHI 0-0 VAN #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Great opportunity for Mezquida here, and probably one of the very few times we see Morales, Mezquida and Rivero all on the same pitch. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire).
Kendall Waston (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Pedro Morales has the Whitecaps' best look at goal

timelineItems.name: Kyle Martino
timelineItems.text: Rosales leaves game from a clean-tackle-with-intent-to-kill. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Kendall looks mad. You should never make Kendall mad. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Thayne Griffin
timelineItems.text: Say it ain't so, Pedro. Two big misses. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Raúl Octavio Rivero following a fast break.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: It hasn't resulted in a goal yet, but this Whitecaps team is lots of fun to watch on the break. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Wow, Morales has to score there. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Chicago Fire 0, Vancouver Whitecaps FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Hot Time In Old Town
timelineItems.text: First half whistle and it's 0-0. #cf97 had glimpses in attack. Defense silencing the lauded #vwfc attack with a bit of luck sprinkled in

timelineItems.name: BLucas
timelineItems.text: Wouldn’t be surprised to see Palmer and Gehrig switch at HT. Stephens’ versatility has been crucial for #cf97

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Poor first half between Chicago and Vancouver. Lack of precision. Whitecaps wasteful. Chicago lacking proper shape in midfield. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Stephen Hay
timelineItems.text: Fire playing well. But they are going to get caught on the break if they keep giving the ball away cheaply. #cf97 #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Matthew DeCap
timelineItems.text: Rivero looking good up top. Manneh being Manneh. Pedro is confounding. Hope Nico brings a little spark. We still can't finish. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Matthew DeCap
timelineItems.text: Kah scares me at the back. Rodriguez too much of an unknown quantity. Devil you know or devil you don't? #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Matthew DeCap
timelineItems.text: Beitashour has not really impressed at all since joining from SJ. I think I'd rather see some more of Sampson. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Steve
timelineItems.text: Tifo champ I spotted from the upper decks #cf97 #breakingbad

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Chicago Fire 0, Vancouver Whitecaps FC 0.
Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Fedora
timelineItems.text: If I'm Vancouver I go inside out to the left or just overload to run at Gehrig. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Jason Kurylo
timelineItems.text: Right ankle sprain for Mauro Rosales. Depending upon the severity, he'll be out a few days or a few months. #WhitecapsFC ##VWFC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: 45 minutes to find a winner. Here we go: http://t.co/qu3dvjUfxy #CHIvVAN http://t.co/wPv7pE8R1d

timelineItems.name: Jeff Krause
timelineItems.text: .@Section8Chicago standing w @ACBrigade as the 2nd half starts. Banner & streamers in solidarity. #cf97 #Galaxy #MLS http://t.co/1FrRgFbJXz

timelineItems.comment: Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Attempt saved. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Chris May
timelineItems.text: Polster is going to see red in this game. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Chicago bypassed midfield twice in the opening 90 seconds. No use in obscuring the approach, then. #MLS #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: ChiFireMatch
timelineItems.text: 49' Dangerous free kick for the Whitecaps in the middle of the pitch, dealt with well by Jon Busch. #cf97 #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 'Caps look threatening down their left side with Adekugbe and Manneh's pace causing Chicago all kinds of problems. #CHIvVAN #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Russell Teibert.

timelineItems.name: AFTN
timelineItems.text: Poor vision from Rivero there. Mezquida free and in acres of space. Poor shot at end of it all too. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Chow
timelineItems.text: #StandingWithACB #cf97 http://t.co/Z1acaHlaNI

timelineItems.name: Louis East
timelineItems.text: Vancouver have started the second half well. Both sides look threatening in attack but can't find the goal #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Pedro Morales with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Victor Sum
timelineItems.text: I love Jordan Harvey but Adekube has been really good and might be hard to take out of the lineup #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Matt Polster (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Fire Conf Live
timelineItems.text: 55'- Polster with a nice tackle from behind to stop Vancouver's attack there. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Fedora
timelineItems.text: Someone has to give Palmer some cover there. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Javier
timelineItems.text: Way too slow from Pedro... AGAIN #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Shoe Thief
timelineItems.text: That's twice now that Mosquito was open on the right and ignored. Wake up Pedro. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Shaun Maloney (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Orrin Schwarz
timelineItems.text: Shaun Maloney looks frustrated #cf97

timelineItems.name: Louis East
timelineItems.text: Disappointing to see Shaun Maloney struggling again. Needs to create more for the Fire in attack. #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Ryan Peraino
timelineItems.text: Do we not play advantage anymore? I've seen 5 times today that advantage should have been played #cf97

timelineItems.name: Brian Sandalow
timelineItems.text: Nothing comes of it, but that was a dangerous free kick by Maloney. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: David Ousted (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire).

timelineItems.name: Chicago Fire Talk
timelineItems.text: 58' - Stephens crossing for Amarikwa, who digs his boot into the stomach of Ousted in his attempt to gather the ball. #cf97 #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Shoe Thief
timelineItems.text: Sam showing up right away! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Brian Sandalow
timelineItems.text: Maybe it wasn't the best struck ball, but that Shipp pass appeared to bump around the grass. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Chicago Fire WUFC
timelineItems.text: Is this the same team that played LA? I mean, passes connection, plays getting created. Ok now men. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Louis East
timelineItems.text: Matt Polster with a good showing on debut but he's replaced by Kennedy Igboananike on 59 minutes. #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: ThreeForAWin
timelineItems.text: If your DPs are subs, something is wrong. #cf97 #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: It's been better from Laba since the start of the game. Getting his tackles in. He needs to: Fire with a spell of play. #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chicago Fire. Conceded by Steven Beitashour.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Shnay
timelineItems.text: OK, that's plenty of bad Maloney corners for one day. Holy Shipp time on the next one please #cf97

timelineItems.name: Shane Murray
timelineItems.text: Gehrig to CB with Igboananike's intro. Palmer to RB, Jones to LB, Shipp to LM and Larentowicz to CM. Kennedy up top with QA. #CHIvVAN #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps FC. Sam Adekugbe tries a through ball, but Kekuta Manneh is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: It will be interesting to see if Fire sub Kennedy Igboananike can change the pace of the game... #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.text: With all the offensive signings, really surprised to see #cf97 lacking end product so badly.

timelineItems.text: #cf97

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Fair play to Mezquida for staying on his feet, but if he went down, a 'Caps FK on the edge of the Fire's box? #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Nicolás Mezquida.

timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Nicolas Mezquida is booked for a dangerous tackle

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: I don't think Shaun Maloney did enough pilates on his last vacation. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Har Journalist
timelineItems.text: Nicolas Mezquida gets his heel clipped by Adailton, he does not go to ground. No free kick and No PK. Scoreless 0-0 71' #WhitecapsFC #cf97

timelineItems.name: David Gubala
timelineItems.text: Come on you Men in Red ! #cf97

timelineItems.name: Brian Sandalow
timelineItems.text: Vancouver getting threatening on the counter. Fire back line getting caught. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Alessandro Sansica
timelineItems.text: Poor second half from Maloney so far #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: Attendance: 15,731 CHI 0-0 VAN #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: FTBL Podcast
timelineItems.text: WE WANT MATTOCKS! WE WANT MATTOCKS! #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Brian Sandalow
timelineItems.text: Fire scored three goals in five preseason games. None so far in the regular season. Guly do Prado about to enter. #cf97

timelineItems.name: MLS Rambler
timelineItems.text: Standard of finishing in #CHIvVAN has been woeful. A few pieces of good buildup play but final product severely lacking.

timelineItems.comment: Eric Gehrig (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Attempt missed. Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Kekuta Manneh.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: The finishing in this game has been atrocious. Should be, roughly, 3-2 right now. 0-0 instead. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: James Patrick Gordon
timelineItems.text: Two years ago we didn't score a goal until Game 4. And that was the 4-1 loss to Chivas. Aren't we supposed to be better now? #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Russell Arbuthnot
timelineItems.text: Mezquida has earned himself a start with his performance in this one. #vwfc #CHIvsVAN

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Mezquida has looked bright since coming on. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: 7' - The pitch is in typical "March in Chicago" condition. CHI 0-0 VAN #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Ian
timelineItems.text: Why are the teams doing color-on-color in this kind of shade?? #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Eric Gehrig (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 8 MIN Ousted quick off his line to clear after Beitashour's back pass comes up short. Great Dane needed to be lively there. #VWFC #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Hanson Ho
timelineItems.text: Despite only one goal in the last almost-two games, for me, this is the most impressive offensive #VWFC side in the MLS era.

timelineItems.name: Angie Snider
timelineItems.text: Toyota Park after a #cf97 goal is one of my favorite places in the world. I hope TP will be more enjoyable this season than the past few!

timelineItems.name: FTBL Podcast
timelineItems.text: Oh man, if the #VWFC click at some at point in the final third, they will be a force to be reckoned with.

timelineItems.name: BLucas
timelineItems.text: Maloney can’t buy a completed pass #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) has gone down, but that's a dive.

timelineItems.name: Cory Jensen
timelineItems.text: How many crosses does Lovell Palmer need to hit to make Frank Yallop to tell him to stop? #cf97 #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.desc: Raul Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Octavio Rivero is booked for embellishment

timelineItems.name: Brian Sandalow
timelineItems.text: Alex in for Stephens. Stephens looked pretty good today. #cf97

timelineItems.name: DC Revs Fan
timelineItems.text: Chicago Fire are clear example of why some MLS teams shouldn't sign DP's just for the sake of having DP's. Not always worth the $. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kennedy Igboananike (Chicago Fire) right footed shot from long range on the left is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Harrison Shipp.

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: It's a new formation (4-1-4-1) and four changes (one enforced) for #cf97. In: Busch, Adailton, Polster, Stephens (1/2) #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - @ChicagoFire have not conceded a goal at home against Vancouver in three @MLS games. Clean. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: Out: Johnson (injured), Watson (bench), Ritter (bench), Igboananike (bench) #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Shane Murray
timelineItems.text: Wholesale changes for #cf97, with Polster in for 1st start. Big, brave decisions from Yallop, need a result to get season going. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Windy City Soccer
timelineItems.text: One change for #VWFC: Adekugbe in for Harvey (bench) #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Paul Kandel
timelineItems.text: New seats for this season. Not too shabby. Plus we dont have to worry about rain anymore. #cf97 #homeopener

timelineItems.text: @ChicagoFire home opener! New seats, new season. #cf97 #WinOrDieTying http://t.co/1clYHiFLWt

timelineItems.text: #hyperlapse 64 and sunny. @chicagofire and Vancouver whitecaps warming up. Beautiful day for home opener #cf97

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 7 - The Fire have failed to score a first half goal in seven consecutive @MLS games now. Lethargic. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Hanson Ho
timelineItems.text: Words like benched and dropped have lost their meaning in the era of squad rotation. Sam for Harvey. NBD. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Jon Busch getting his body behind every Fire save after the break... Routine for the veteran shot-stopper... #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.text: Sam Adekugbe in for Jordan Harvey at today. Not an entirely surprising decision after last weeks performance #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.text: YES !!!!!!!! FINALLY !!!!! GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAALLLL Hard work and persistence pays off! @WhitecapsFC #VANvCHI #VWFC

timelineItems.text: Great lay-off, great strike! Rivero with his second! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: G86' - Well... Beitashour has not been his best, but assists on Rivero's second of the season. 'Caps 1-0 up late! #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.text: Octavio Rivero strikes for @WhitecapsFC to give them a 1-0 lead with 5 to play: http://t.co/6XUqDTK73Q #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.text: Rivero gets his second of the season. Close game, little quality, but Vancouver just about deserve that. #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: The look on Yallop's face says it all. 3 goals conceded by Chicago inside 2 games: 2 of them from defensive giveaways... #CHIvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: Manneh on Gehrig is a matchup the Whitecaps will look to exploit. Adekugbe can push up on overlap to create 2v1, too. #MLS #CHIvVAN

timelineItems.text: Rivero is a better DP signing than all 3 Chicago Fire DPs combined… #CHIvVAN #VWFC #cf97

timelineItems.name: Aaron Sharpsteen
timelineItems.text: After the last game, the question isn't when #cf97 1st win will come, but rather when they will score. I think they could push 300 minutes.

timelineItems.text: Fitting that the Chicago broadcast video has cut out. #CHIvVAN
